Methods in org.apache.jackrabbit.jcr2spi.hierarchy with parameters of type ItemId
 HierarchyEntry HierarchyManagerImpl.getHierarchyEntry(ItemId itemId)
           
 HierarchyEntry HierarchyManager.getHierarchyEntry(ItemId itemId)
          Resolves a itemId into a HierarchyEntry.
 HierarchyEntry HierarchyManagerImpl.lookup(ItemId workspaceItemId)
           
 HierarchyEntry HierarchyManager.lookup(ItemId workspaceItemId)
          Lookup of HierarchyEntry workspace Id, that may be different if a entry (or any of its ancestors) has been transiently moved or reordered.

If the Hierarchy already lists the entry with the given workspaceItemId it is returned otherwise null.
